column1: Appendix table 1. Imprisonment rates, based on sentenced prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, per 100,000 U.S. residents and 100,000 U.S. adults, 1978-2018
Data Source:  Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 1978-2018; and U.S. Census Bureau, post-censal resident population estimates for January 1 of the following calendar year
Author: E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statistician
Appendix table 1. Imprisonment rates, based on sentenced prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, per 100,000 U.S. residents and 100,000 U.S. adults, 1978-2018
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 1978-2018; and U.S. Census Bureau, post-censal resident population estimates for January 1 of the following calendar year.
